short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bare minimum addon to capture a webpage screenshot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bare minimum chrome extension to capture a webpage screenshot. No fancy features; just click the icon to generate screenshot. Copy it or download it using the icons.
